### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of a wooden chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) with coal
### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a wooden chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5) with coal and iron-plate
### Coal storage at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a wooden chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a steam engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5) 
### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with no power

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it
-  Ensure the entity can accept the item you are trying to insert
-  Check if the entity has available space for the item
### Errors when using get_entity
-  Ensure the entity you are trying to get exists on the map
-  Make sure you are using the correct prototype when getting an entity
### Errors when crafting items
-  Ensure the item you are trying to craft exists and you are using the correct prototype
-  Check if you have the necessary ingredients to craft the item
### Errors when connecting entities to power source
-  Ensure the entity you are trying to connect to power source can be connected
-  Make sure you have a power source to connect the entity to
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile where you are trying to place the entity is not occupied by another entity
-  Make sure you can place the entity on the tile before attempting to place it
